alert.note: Alert for Glasscock; Howard; Martin; Midland (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 09 at 10:41PM CDT until April 09 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Glasscock County in western Texas... Northeastern Midland County in western Texas... Southwestern Howard County in western Texas... Southeastern Martin County in western Texas... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1040 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles east of Lenorah, or 13 miles south of Ackerly, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Big Spring, Stanton, Forsan, Lomax, Big Spring Country Club, Big Spring McMahon-Wrinkle Airpark, Knott, Stanton Municipal Aiport and Elbow. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 155 and 181. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
